atomica.logic
Class GameSituationSerializer

java.lang.Object
  atomica.logic.GameSituationSerializer

public class GameSituationSerializer
extends java.lang.Object

Simple class for De-/Serialization of a GameSituation object into/from a binary file.

Author:
Georg Ludewig
